javascript
importÂ html2CanvasÂ fromÂ 'html2canvas'
importÂ JsPDFÂ fromÂ 'jspdf'

exportÂ defaultÂ {
  install(Vue, options) {
    Vue.prototype.getPdfÂ =Â function(title,id) {
      html2Canvas(document.querySelector(id), {Â // ä½¿ç”¨é¡µé¢çš„æ€»DIV çš„IDï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚ el-col
        allowTaint:Â true,
        useCORS:Â true,
        // scale: 2 // æå‡ç”»é¢è´¨é‡ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ä¼šå¢åŠ æ–‡ä»¶å¤§å°
      }).then((canvas) =>Â {
        // ä»¥ä¸‹å¤§å°ç»è¿‡æµ‹è¯•æ¯”è¾ƒåˆé€‚ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ ¹æ®è‡ªå·±çš„éœ€è¦ï¼Œä¸€ç‚¹ç‚¹è°ƒæ•´
        constÂ contentWidth = (canvas.widthÂ +Â 100) *Â 0.2
        constÂ contentHeight = (canvas.heightÂ +Â 100) *Â 0.2

        /* å¯¼å‡ºä¸åˆ†é¡µå¤„ç† */
        constÂ pageData = canvas.toDataURL('image/jpeg',Â 1.0)
        constÂ img =Â newÂ Image()
        img.srcÂ = pageData
        constÂ imgWidth = (canvas.width) *Â 0.195
        constÂ imgHeight = (canvas.height) *Â 0.195Â // å†…å®¹å›¾ç‰‡è¿™é‡Œä¸éœ€è¦ç•™ç™½çš„è·ç¦»

        // å¯¼å‡ºpdf
        letÂ PDF
        img.onloadÂ =Â function() {
          ifÂ (contentWidth > contentHeight) {
            PDFÂ =Â newÂ JsPDF('l',Â 'mm', [contentWidth, contentHeight])
          }Â elseÂ {
            PDFÂ =Â newÂ JsPDF('p',Â 'mm', [contentWidth, contentHeight])
          }
          PDF.addImage(pageData,Â 'jpeg',Â 10,Â 10, imgWidth, imgHeight)
          PDF.save(title +Â '.pdf')
        }
        returnÂ true
      })
    }
  }
